descriptionHtml:
>NEW VERSION< http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52800/?

_____________________________________________________________________________

Save game meant to be used only to copy the face of it's character, not recommended to play.
NORD save game!

Required mods:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951//? [0.85]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709//?
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30175/? [use only it's textures]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722//?
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30411//?
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624//?
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33526//?

Optional mods

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13457/?
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24828//?

Instructions:

Load the save, use shadowracemenu and then press F5 to save the face, after that press F9 to apply it.
Tip: Don't try it on custom races.
author: Taveira aka shadowfake
